channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens -- EN100 Ethernet module DNP3 IP variant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens -- EN100 Ethernet module DNP3 IP variant

item.title: CVE-2022-30938|2024-08-03T07:03:39.678Z -- siemens -- en100%20ethernet%20module%20dnp3%20ip%20variant
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in EN100 Ethernet module DNP3 IP variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module IEC 104 variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module IEC 61850 variant (All versions < V4.40), EN100 Ethernet module Modbus TCP variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module PROFINET IO variant (All versions). Affected applications contains a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing specially crafted HTTP packets to /txtrace endpoint manupulating a specific argument. This could allow an attacker to crash the affected application leading to a denial of service condition

item.title: CVE-2022-30937|2024-08-03T07:03:39.594Z -- siemens -- en100%20ethernet%20module%20dnp3%20ip%20variant
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in EN100 Ethernet module DNP3 IP variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module IEC 104 variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module IEC 61850 variant (All versions < V4.37), EN100 Ethernet module Modbus TCP variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module PROFINET IO variant (All versions). Affected applications contains a memory corruption vulnerability while parsing specially crafted HTTP packets to /txtrace endpoint. This could allow an attacker to crash the affected application leading to a denial of service condition.
